product_name: Sierra Designs Cloud Pants - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Stash the lightweight, compact, waterproof Sierra Designs Cloud Pants in your backpack and pull them on when the rain begins to fall. Single-layer waterproof, breathable nylon fabric and fully taped PVC-free seams keep water from getting in. Adjustable lower leg vents allow airflow and let you pull the pants on over footwear. Waist adjustment lets you fine-tune the fit. Sierra Designs Cloud Pants stuff into their own pocket. Closeout.
short_description: Stash the lightweight, compact, waterproof Sierra Designs Cloud Pants in your backpack and pull them on when the rain begins to fall.
